title: Bonus: Drop Us A Line - May 2023
content:
Dan, James and Andrew sift through the correspondence sent in by listeners. PLUS there's a super special Top of Show announcement!

Visit nosuchthingasafish.com for news about live shows, merchandise and more episodes.

If you'd like to write in, you can email podcast@qi.com
